Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students using a string telephone to communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate how sound travels through the string to send and receive messages.
The student can show how each student holds one end of the string, ensuring the string is tight.
The student can label the parts of the string telephone, such as the cups and string, in the drawing.
The student can use labels or captions to explain how the device uses sound to communicate.
The student can include a simple explanation of why this device solves the problem of long-distance communication.
The student can draw any relevant materials used to make the string telephone.
